lead_paragraph: Federal authorities, suspecting that JPMorgan Chase turned a blind eye to Bernard L. Madoff’s huge Ponzi scheme, are preparing to take action in a criminal investigation of the bank, Ben Protess and Jessica Silver-Greenberg report in DealBook. Coming on the heels of a tentative $13 billion settlement over JPMorgan’s mortgage practices, the case poses another major threat to the bank’s reputation.
